alert.note: Alert for Maries; Miller (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 18 at 8:59AM CDT until July 18 at 9:45AM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Maries County in central Missouri... Central Miller County in central Missouri... * Until 945 AM CDT. * At 858 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Versailles, moving southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Eldon, Saint Elizabeth, St. Elizabeth, Tuscumbia, Eugene, Olean, Etterville, Marys Home and Aurora Springs. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
